actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide an appropriate classification of recently developed dairy products.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duties on whey protein concentrate and milk protein concentrate. Grants duty-free treatment of lactalbumin. Defines "milk protein concentrate" to mean any milk protein concentrate that is 40 percent or more protein by weight. Imposes a limit upon the amount of whey protein concentrate, lactalbumin, and milk protein concentrate that may be entered into the United States.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide an appropriate classification of recently developed dairy products.
